TEXT.TITLE: ONTARIO TREASURY BILL YIELD RISES
TEXT.BODY: This week's Ontario government auction of 50 mln dlrs worth of 91-day treasury bills yielded an average of 6.91 pct, up from 6.87 pct last week, a treasury department spokesman said. Average price was 98.307. Reuter
